subject: REQUEST: Add venueTimezone field to Voice API
body:
## Request: Add venueTimezone

Please add `venueTimezone` to Voice API response.

### Why
- GPT can tell users what timezone the event is in
- Useful when user is in different timezone than venue
- Example: User in California asks about Boston event

### Format
IANA timezone string, e.g.:
- "America/New_York"
- "America/Los_Angeles"
- "America/Chicago"

### Example Response
```json
{
  "title": "Practica Spark",
  "dateFormatted": "Monday, January 6",
  "timeFormatted": "7:00 PM",
  "venueName": "Dance Union",
  "venueCity": "Cambridge",
  "venueTimezone": "America/New_York"
}
```

### GPT Usage
"Practica Spark is Monday at 7:00 PM Eastern (America/New_York)"

Or simplified: "7:00 PM Boston time"

-- Cronas
